long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your software demos into personalized, "one of one" experiences.

Whether you need to change branding, content, images, charts, or just get predictable and reliable information on the screen every time. Tailored allows turning a series of web pages into a visual template: fill out the values of your choosing, press a button, and voilà - they magically appear in the right place, with pixel perfection native to your product. 

Record your screen, voice, and face to create a story that your audience will instantly connect with. Share it, and receive detailed notifications and engagement analytics.
